name: Seeds of Decay
description: The shattered fragments of Greer's armor rain down on the arena. Smaller pieces explode on impact, but larger fragments transform into titanspawn, ready to help Greer in the fight.

name: Harmonic Sensitivity
description: Taking damage from a fluxlance attack while under the effects of Harmonic Sensitivity causes extra damage.

name: Fulminate
description:
Just before Decima unleashes Flux Nova, she also fulminates all conduits. 

Conduits with 3 charges damage all enemies, apply exposed, and grant Decima 5 stacks of Peal of Harmony and Peal of Discord.

Conduits with 1 or 2 charges damage all enemies.

name: Foreshock
description: Decima performs a series of stomp attacks to pulverize her puny opponents.

name: Sweep the Mold
description: Greer sweeps his claw in a 60-degree cone, damaging, bleeding, poisoning, and knocking back targets. This attack sets up Rake the Rot, the next attack in the chain.

name: Sparking Aura
description: Conduits with charge periodically release dancing sparks that move toward Decima. Sparks lose some health and stop moving temporarily when enough players are standing in their aura. If a dancing spark reaches Decima, it is absorbed and grants her some charge.

name: Noxious Blight
description: Noxious blights form persistent pools of corruption on the ground. Foes in a noxious blight take continuous damage, and their boons will be corrupted while they remain in the noxious blight.

name: Foreshock
description: Decima performs a series of stomp attacks to pulverize her puny opponents.

name: Noxious Blight
description: Noxious blights form persistent pools of corruption on the ground. Foes in a noxious blight take continuous damage, and their boons will be corrupted while they remain in the noxious blight.

name: Enfeebling Miasma
description: Greer exhales lingering clouds of poisonous gas that travel outward to form 3 roughly conical areas. The gas clouds stay in place for several seconds, poisoning foes inside them.

name: Propel
description: Ura launches herself at the furthest target, dealing a high amount of damage when she lands.

name: Decimation
description: As Decima gains Charge, her fluxlance attacks deal extra damage.

name: Wave of Corruption
description: An expanding circular shockwave thats spreads outward. Players hit by the wave of corruption take damage, gain vulnerability, are knocked down, and have a number of their boons corrupted. This attack cannot be blocked, but players can avoid the effects by jumping over it.

name: Seismic Crash
description: When Decima leaps, anything she lands on gets squashed like a bug.

name: Thrumming Presence

facts.description:
Thrumming Presence has made you more vulnerable to Decima's fluxlance attacks.

When taking damage from a fluxlance attack, you will also take significant extra damage from Harmonic Sensitivity.

description:
Decima's aura makes your bones resonate with arcane flux. Each time she gains charge, the sensation becomes more painful.

Makes enemies more vulnerable to Decima's fluxlance beams.

name: Flux Nova
description:
Upon reaching maximum charge, Decima gathers all her arcane flux into an unstable orb. After a few seconds, she detonates it to obliterate her enemies.

This version of Flux Nova can trigger any time Decima reaches maximum charge.

name: Blob of Blight
description: Reeg targets up to 3 foes, preferring the most distant combatants. He slams his fist down, creating a damaging sphere that will then fire a blob of blight that follows the targeted enemy for 12 seconds, firing multiple smaller projectiles as it moves. If it hits a targeted foe, it will also create a stationary blob of blight that fires projectiles for several seconds.

name: Foreshock
description: Decima performs a series of stomp attacks to pulverize her puny opponents.

name: Harmonious Thunder

facts.description: Decima will periodically consumes stacks of this effect to target a number of conduits with Chorus of Thunder.

description:
Decima calls out to the storm, and the storm responds with a thundering chorus.

Decima targets a number of conduits with bolts of Harmonious Thunder, granting them each some charge.

name: Sparking Aura
description: Conduits with charge periodically release dancing sparks that move toward Decima. Sparks lose some health and stop moving temporarily when enough players are standing in their aura. If a dancing spark reaches Decima, it is absorbed and grants her some charge.

name: Fracture Armor
description: Decima's armor fractures, leaving her vulnerable to her own Flux Nova attack. When Flux Nova detonates, Decima will become stunned and exposed.

name: Decimation
description: As Decima gains Charge, her fluxlance attacks deal extra damage.

name: Flux Nova
description:
Decima gathers a colossal amount of arcane flux into an unstable orb. After several seconds, she detonates this orb to obliterate her enemies.

If Decima reaches full charge while channeling this skill, it ends early, and the damage becomes unsurvivable.

name: Fluxlance Salvo
description:
Decima fires a salvo of fluxlance beams simultaneously. A conduit struck by a beam gains Charge, but blocks the beam's path, allowing targets to take cover if needed.

Makes enemies vulnerable to dancing sparks.

name: Cage of Decay
description: Greer creates a fan of 5 cascades, starting at the edges of a 180-degree arc and moving toward the center. Rippling thorn barriers travel along these lines, damaging and knocking back anything struck by them. When the barriers reach the end of their track, they create a circular rot cage of barriers surrounding a zone of noxious blight.

name: Earthrend
description: Decima causes a large ring-shaped area of ground to erupt with jagged rocks and pyrite. The tremendous force sends enemies sliding toward Decima. Enemies that impact a conduit will take extra damage and ricochet in another direction.

name: Fluxlance
description:
Decima fires a single fluxlance beam at an enemy. A conduit struck by the beam gains Charge, but blocks the beam's path, allowing targets to take cover if needed.

Makes enemies vulnerable to dancing sparks.

name: Seismic Crash
description: When Decima leaps, anything she lands on gets squashed like a bug.

name: Sulfuric Froth
description: Inflicts Sulfuric Acid

name: Earthrend
description: Decima causes a large ring-shaped area of ground to erupt with jagged rocks and pyrite. The tremendous force sends enemies sliding toward Decima. Enemies that impact a conduit will take extra damage and ricochet in another direction.

name: Sulfuric Froth
description: Inflicts Sulfuric Acid

name: Flux Nova
description:
Upon reaching maximum charge, Decima gathers all her arcane flux into an unstable orb. After a few seconds, she detonates it to obliterate her enemies.

This version of Flux Nova can trigger any time Decima reaches maximum charge.

name: Return
description: Ura creates a whirlpool, sucking in players and teleporting them to the center of her arena.

name: Fluxlance Salvo
description:
Decima fires a salvo of fluxlance beams simultaneously. A conduit struck by a beam gains Charge, but blocks the beam's path, allowing targets to take cover if needed.

Makes enemies vulnerable to dancing sparks.

name: Galvanic Sensitivity
description: Taking damage from a spark while under the effects of Galvanic Sensitivity causes extra damage.

name: Fluxlance Salvo

facts.description:
Recent damage from Decima's fluxlance attacks has made you more vulnerable to dancing sparks.

When taking damage from a dancing spark, you will also take significant extra damage from Galvanic Sensitivity.

Galvanic Sensitivity removes Harmonic Sensitivity and prevents it from being applied for the duration.

description:
Decima fires a salvo of fluxlance beams simultaneously. A conduit struck by a beam gains Charge, but blocks the beam's path, allowing targets to take cover if needed.

Makes enemies vulnerable to dancing sparks.

name: Eruption of Rot
description: The Greerling places a stacking indicator on several players. If the indicated number of players are within the circle when time runs out, the rot eruption is stabilized and only does damage. If a player is within more than one stacking circle, they are instantly killed. If there are not enough players within the circle, a rot eruption occurs and the Greerling gains 2 empowered stacks.

name: Fulminate

facts.description: Decima will periodically consumes stacks of this effect to target a number of conduits with Chorus of Thunder.
Decima will periodically consume stacks of this effect to target a number of nearby enemies with Chorus of Thunder.

description:
Just before Decima unleashes Flux Nova, she also fulminates all conduits. 

Conduits with 3 charges damage all enemies, apply exposed, and grant Decima 5 stacks of Peal of Harmony and Peal of Discord.

Conduits with 1 or 2 charges damage all enemies.

name: Cage of Decay
description: Gree creates a fan of 5 cascades, starting at the edges of a 180-degree arc and moving towards the center. Rippling thorn barriers travel along these lines, damaging and knocking back anything struck by them. When the barriers reach the end of their track, they create a circular rot cage of barriers surrounding a zone of noxious blight.

name: Noxious Blight
description: Noxious blights form persistent pools of corruption on the ground. Foes in a noxious blight take continuous damage, and their boons will be corrupted while they remain in the noxious blight.

name: Seismic Crash
description:
Decima slams down, causing the immediate vicinity to erupt with jagged rocks and pyrite. The tremendous force sends enemies sliding away. Dodge rolling will end the slide prematurely. Deals increased damge to close targets.

Enemies that impact a conduit will take extra damage and ricochet in another direction.

name: Rake the Rot
description: Greer sweeps his claw in a 60-degree cone, damaging, crippling, poisoning, and knocking back targets. This attack sets up Stomp the Mould, the final attack in the chain.

name: Eruption of Rot
description: Greer places a stacking indicator on several players. If the indicated number of players are within the circle when time runs out, the rot eruption is stabilized and only does damage. If a player is within more than one stacking circle, they are instantly killed. If there are not enough players within the circle, a rot eruption occurs, and the Greerling gains 2 empowered stacks.

name: Invulnerable Barrier
description: Greer encircles himself in a barrier, protecting himself from further harm while his Greerlings attack his foes. Players entering the barrier will be knocked back.

name: Empowering Blast
description: Fires a projectile of corrupted life energy at Greer. If it hits Greer, it grants him 2 empowered stacks. If it hits a player, it will knock them back and continue on. If it is blocked by a player, the projectile is destroyed.

name: Fulminate
description: Conduits that already have 3 charges when hit by fluxlance or thunder attack damage all enemies in the encounter, apply exposed, and grant Decima 5 stacks of Peal of Harmony and Peal of Discord.

name: Stomp the Growth
description: The Greerling stomps 3 times in quick succession. The first two stomps hit all targets in a circle around the impact point dealing damage, inflicting poison, and applying vulnerability. The third stomp creates a wave of corruption.

name: Sweep the Mold
description: Greer sweeps his claw in a 60-degree cone, damaging, bleeding, poisoning, and knocking back targets. This attack sets up Rake the Rot, the next attack in the chain.

name: Toxic Geyser
description: Applies poison and Sulfuric Acid, and grants protection and might to Ura.

name: Seeds of Decay
description: The shattered fragments of Greer's armor rain down on the arena. Smaller pieces explode on impact, but larger fragments transform into titanspawn, ready to help Greer in the fight.

name: Blob of Blight
description: Greer targets up to 3 foes, preferring the most distant combatants. He slams his fist down, creating a damaging sphere that will then fire a blob of blight that follows the targeted enemy for 12 seconds, firing multiple smaller projectiles as it moves. If it hits a targeted foe, it will also create a stationary blob of blight that fires projectiles for several seconds.

name: Fluxlance Fusillade
description:
Decima fires several fluxlance beams at enemies in sequence. Conduits struck by a beam gain charge, but block the beam's path, allowing targets to take cover if needed.

Makes enemies vulnerable to dancing sparks.

name: Fluxlance Salvo
description:
Decima fires a salvo of fluxlance beams simultaneously. A conduit struck by a beam gains Charge, but blocks the beam's path, allowing targets to take cover if needed.

Makes enemies vulnerable to dancing sparks.

name: Noxious Blight
description: Noxious blights form persistent pools of corruption on the ground. Foes in a noxious blight take continuous damage, and their boons will be corrupted while they remain in the noxious blight.

name: Fulgent Aura
description: Charged conduits emit a dangerous aura of Arcane Flux that damages nearby enemies. The aura increases in size as the conduit gains more Charge.

name: Ripples of Rot
description: Greer leaps into the air towards a targeted player. When Greer lands, targets directly under him will be knocked back. He then fires cascades of rot walls that ripple outward, inflicting damage, knockback, and bleeding on anyone hit by them. The final rot wall stays in place, blocking player projectiles that hit them.

name: Fluxlance Salvo
description:
Decima fires a salvo of fluxlance beams simultaneously. A conduit struck by a beam gains Charge, but blocks the beam's path, allowing targets to take cover if needed.

Makes enemies vulnerable to dancing sparks.

name: Toxic Geyser
description: Applies poison and Sulfuric Acid, and grants protection and might to Ura.

name: Empowering Blast
description: Fires a projectile of corrupted life energy at Greer. If it hits Greer, it grants him 2 empowered stacks. If it hits a player, it will knock them back and continue on. If it is blocked by a player, the projectile is destroyed.

name: Fluxlance

facts.description:
Recent damage from Decima's fluxlance attacks has made you more vulnerable to dancing sparks.

When taking damage from a dancing spark, you will also take significant extra damage from Galvanic Sensitivity.

Galvanic Sensitivity removes Harmonic Sensitivity and prevents it from being applied for the duration.

description:
Decima fires a single fluxlance beam at an enemy. A conduit struck by the beam gains Charge, but blocks the beam's path, allowing targets to take cover if needed.

Makes enemies vulnerable to dancing sparks.

name: Earthrend
description: Decima causes a large ring-shaped area of ground to erupt with jagged rocks and pyrite. The tremendous force sends enemies sliding toward Decima. Enemies that impact a conduit will take extra damage and ricochet in another direction.

name: Mainshock

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

description: Decima slams an orb of arcane flux into the ground, causing a cascade of ruptures to form around her. The ground heaves with enough force to shatter bones and cripple her enemies.

name: Eruption of Rot
description: Greer places a stacking indicator on several players. If the indicated number of players are within the circle when time runs out, the rot eruption is stabilized and only does damage. If a player is within more than one stacking circle, they are instantly killed. If there are not enough players within the circle, a rot eruption occurs and the Greerling gains 2 empowered stacks.

name: Mainshock

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

description: Decima slams an orb of arcane flux into the ground, causing a cascade of ruptures to form around her. The ground heaves with enough force to shatter bones and cripple her enemies.

name: Thrumming Presence
description:
Decima's aura makes your bones resonate with arcane flux. Each time she gains charge, the sensation becomes more painful.

Makes enemies more vulnerable to Decima's fluxlance beams.

name: Rake the Rot
description: Greer sweeps his claw in a 60-degree cone, damaging, crippling, poisoning, and knocking back targets. This attack sets up Stomp the Mould, the final attack in the chain.

name: Earthrend
description: When Decima leaps, anything she lands on gets squashed like a bug.

name: Eruption Vent
description: Ura causes a sulfuric geyser to erupt at target's location after several seconds, creating a shockwave and leaving behind a geyser that inflicts poison and Sulfuric Acid on enemies and benefits allies.

name: Fulminate

facts.description: Decima will periodically consumes stacks of this effect to target a number of conduits with Chorus of Thunder.
Decima will periodically consume stacks of this effect to target a number of nearby enemies with Chorus of Thunder.

description: Conduits that already have 3 charges when hit by fluxlance or thunder attack damage all enemies in the encounter, apply exposed, and grant Decima 5 stacks of Peal of Harmony and Peal of Discord.

name: Sweep the Mold
description: The Greerling sweeps its claw in a 60-degree cone, damaging, bleeding, poisoning, and knocking back targets. This attack sets up Rake the Rot, the next attack in the chain.

name: Fulgent Aura
description: Charged conduits emit a dangerous aura of Arcane Flux that damages nearby enemies. The aura increases in size as the conduit gains more Charge.

name: Foreshock
description: Decima performs a series of stomp attacks to pulverize her puny opponents.

name: Acid Spray
description: Inflicts Sulfuric Acid

name: Stomp the Growth
description: Greer stomps 3 times in quick succession. The first two stomps hit all targets in a circle around the impact point, dealing damage, inflicting poison, and applying vulnerability. The third stomp creates a wave of corruption.

name: Discordant Thunder

facts.description: Decima will periodically consume stacks of this effect to target a number of nearby enemies with Chorus of Thunder.

description:
Decima calls out to the storm, and the storm responds with a thundering chorus.

A number of players closest to Decima are targeted with bolts of Discordant Thunder. If a bolt's area of effect strikes a conduit, it gains some charge.

name: Rot Eruption
description: Rot walls burst up from the ground, knocking players back and creating a noxious blight at the eruption point. Players hit by a rot eruption take damage and gain poison, bleeding, and a stack of infectious rot.

name: Pressure Blast
description: Causes an eruption that imprisons the target and nearby enemies. Can be dispelled using a bloodstone shard.

name: Scattering Sporeblast
description: The Greerling rapidly fires exploding spores in a cone in front of it. Players in this cone will be directly targeted by the spores.

name: Sparking Aura
description: Conduits with charge periodically release dancing sparks that move toward Decima. Sparks lose some health and stop moving temporarily when enough players are standing in their aura. If the dancing spark reaches Decima, it is absorbed and grants her some charge.

name: Earthrend
description: When Decima leaps, anything she lands on gets squashed like a bug.

name: Rake the Rot
description: The Greerling sweeps its claw in a 60-degree cone, damaging, crippling, poisoning, and knocking back targets. This attack sets up Stomp the Mould, the final attack in the chain.

name: Rot the World
description: Greer rains explosive spores down on the battlefield as he musters his power. This leaves him vulnerable, opening his defiance bar. If players do not break him, he will spawn rot cages under the feet of every player in the raid, as well as extra ones, choking the battlefield. Breaking him will interrupt the attack.

name: Enfeebling Miasma
description: Reeg exhales lingering clouds of poisonous gas that travel outward to form 3 roughly conical areas. The gas clouds stay in place for several seconds, poisoning foes inside them.

name: Rain of Spores
description: Greer targets 3 players, preferring the farthest away, and then fires a torrent of exploding spores along a line that moves towards the initial position of the target. The spores explode on impact, inflicting damage, poison, and confusion.

name: Fulgent Fence
description: Decima periodically links two conduits together with a tether of arcane flux. Enemies entering the beam are damaged and pushed out. Enemies that are shoved into the beam by Decima's attacks are ejected at high speed.

name: Blob of Blight
description: If one of Greer's blobs of blight hits a targeted player, it explodes and places a stationary blob of blight that will continue to fire projectiles for several seconds.

name: Mainshock

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

description: Decima slams an orb of arcane flux into the ground, causing a cascade of ruptures to form around her. The ground heaves with enough force to shatter bones and cripple her enemies.

description: Greer rapidly fires spores in a cone in front of him. Players in this cone will be directly targeted by the spores.

description:
Decima calls out to the storm, which responds with a thundering chorus. This consumes all stacks of Peal of Discord and Peal of Harmony.

Each stack of Peal of Discord lets Decima target the closest untargeted player with Chorus of Thunder.

Each stack of Peal of Harmony lets Decima target an uncharged conduit near the farthest player.

Thunderbolts deal increased damage to secondary targets in their area.

name: Fluxlance Salvo

facts.description:
Recent damage from Decima's fluxlance attacks has made you more vulnerable to dancing sparks.

When taking damage from a dancing spark, you will also take significant extra damage from Galvanic Sensitivity.

Galvanic Sensitivity removes Harmonic Sensitivity and prevents it from being applied for the duration.

description:
Decima fires a salvo of fluxlance beams simultaneously. A conduit struck by a beam gains Charge, but blocks the beam's path, allowing targets to take cover if needed.

Makes enemies vulnerable to dancing sparks.

name: Flux Nova
description:
Decima gathers a colossal amount of arcane flux into an unstable orb. After several seconds, she detonates this orb to obliterate her enemies.

If Decima reaches full charge while channeling this skill, it ends early, and the damage becomes unsurvivable.

name: Seismoelectricity
description:
Transcendent Boulder leaps into the air and slams its fists down, damaging and knocking down nearby enemies. Additionally, six boon-stripping arcs of electricity are released that spread out before returning to their source.

The arcs can only strike enemies touching the ground.

name: Eruption of Rot
description: The Greerling places a stacking indicator on several players. If the indicated number of players are within the circle when time runs out, the rot eruption is stabilized and only does damage. If a player is within more than one stacking circle, they are instantly killed. If there are not enough players within the circle, a rot eruption occurs and the Greerling gains 2 empowered stacks.

name: Seeds of Decay
description: The shattered fragments of Greer's armor rain down on the arena. Smaller pieces explode on impact, but larger fragments transform into titanspawn, ready to help Greer in the fight.

name: Thrumming Presence

facts.description:
Thrumming Presence has made you more vulnerable to Decima's fluxlance attacks.

When taking damage from a fluxlance attack, you will also take significant extra damage from Harmonic Sensitivity.

description:
Decima's aura makes your bones resonate with arcane flux. Each time she gains charge, the sensation becomes more painful.

Makes enemies more vulnerable to Decima's fluxlance beams.

name: Eruption of Rot
description: Greer places a stacking indicator on several players. If the indicated number of players are within the circle when time runs out, the rot eruption is stabilized and only does damage. If a player is within more than one stacking circle, they are instantly killed. If there are not enough players within the circle, a rot eruption occurs and the Greerling gains 2 empowered stacks.

name: Empowering Blast
description: Fires a projectile of corrupted life energy at Greer. If it hits Greer, it grants him 2 empowered stacks. If it hits a player, it will knock them back and continue on. If it is blocked by a player, the projectile is destroyed.

name: Ripples of Rot
description: The Greerling leaps into the air towards a targeted player. When the Greerling lands, targets directly under it will be knocked back. It then fires cascades of rot walls that ripple outward, inflicting damage, knockback, and bleeding on anyone they hit. The final rot wall stays in place, blocking player projectiles that hit them.

name: Seismic Crash
description:
Decima slams down, causing the immediate vicinity to erupt with jagged rocks and pyrite. The tremendous force sends enemies sliding away. Dodge rolling will end the slide prematurely. Deals increased damge to close targets.

Enemies that impact a conduit will take extra damage and ricochet in another direction.

name: Fulminate

facts.description: Decima will periodically consumes stacks of this effect to target a number of conduits with Chorus of Thunder.
Decima will periodically consume stacks of this effect to target a number of nearby enemies with Chorus of Thunder.

description:
Just before Decima unleashes Flux Nova, she also fulminates all conduits. 

Conduits with 3 charges damage all enemies, apply exposed, and grant Decima 5 stacks of Peal of Harmony and Peal of Discord.

Conduits with 1 or 2 charges damage all enemies.

name: Seismic Crash
description:
Decima slams down, causing the immediate vicinity to erupt with jagged rocks and pyrite. The tremendous force sends enemies sliding away. Dodge rolling will end the slide prematurely. Deals increased damge to close targets.

Enemies that impact a conduit will take extra damage and ricochet in another direction.

name: Blob of Blight
description: Greer targets up to 3 foes, preferring the most distant combatants. He slams his fist down, creating a damaging sphere that will then fire a blob of blight that follows the targeted enemy for 12 seconds, firing multiple smaller projectiles as it moves. If it hits a targeted foe, it will also create a stationary blob of blight that fires projectiles for several seconds.

name: Cage of Decay
description: Gree creates a fan of 5 cascades, starting at the edges of a 180-degree arc and moving toward the center. Rippling thorn barriers travel along these lines, damaging and knocking back anything struck by them. When the barriers reach the end of their track, they create a circular rot cage of barriers surrounding a zone of noxious blight. Players caught in the rot cage gain a stack of Plague Rot.

name: Noxious Blight
description: Noxious blights form persistent pools of corruption on the ground. Foes in a noxious blight take continuous damage, and their boons will be corrupted while they remain in the noxious blight.

name: Discordant Thunder

facts.description: Decima will periodically consume stacks of this effect to target a number of nearby enemies with Chorus of Thunder.

description:
Decima calls out to the storm, and the storm responds with a thundering chorus.

A number of players closest to Decima are targeted with bolts of Discordant Thunder. If a bolt's area of effect strikes a conduit, it gains some charge.

name: Fluxlance Salvo

facts.description:
Recent damage from Decima's fluxlance attacks has made you more vulnerable to dancing sparks.

When taking damage from a dancing spark, you will also take significant extra damage from Galvanic Sensitivity.

Galvanic Sensitivity removes Harmonic Sensitivity and prevents it from being applied for the duration.

description:
Decima fires a salvo of fluxlance beams simultaneously. A conduit struck by a beam gains Charge, but blocks the beam's path, allowing targets to take cover if needed.

Makes enemies vulnerable to dancing sparks.

name: Stomp the Growth
description: The Greerling stomps 3 times in quick succession. The first two stomps hit all targets in a circle around the impact point dealing damage, inflicting poison, and applying vulnerability. The third stomp creates a wave of corruption.

Decima gathers a colossal amount of arcane flux into an unstable orb. After several seconds, she detonates this orb to obliterate her enemies.

If Decima reaches full charge while channeling this skill, it ends early, and the damage becomes unsurvivable.

name: Blob of Blight
description: If one of Greer's blobs of blight hits a targeted player, it explodes and places a stationary blob of blight that will continue to fire projectiles for several seconds.

name: Sweep the Mold
description: Greer sweeps his claw in a 60-degree cone, damaging, bleeding, poisoning, and knocking back targets. This attack sets up Rake the Rot, the next attack in the chain.

name: Eruption of Rot
description: Greer places a stacking indicator on several players. If the indicated number of players are within the circle when time runs out, the rot eruption is stabilized and only does damage. If a player is within more than one stacking circle, they are instantly killed. If there are not enough players within the circle, a rot eruption occurs and the Greerling gains 2 empowered stacks.

name: Mainshock

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

description: Decima slams an orb of arcane flux into the ground, causing a cascade of ruptures to form around her. The ground heaves with enough force to shatter bones and cripple her enemies.

name: Fluxlance Salvo

facts.description:
Recent damage from Decima's fluxlance attacks has made you more vulnerable to dancing sparks.

When taking damage from a dancing spark, you will also take significant extra damage from Galvanic Sensitivity.

Galvanic Sensitivity removes Harmonic Sensitivity and prevents it from being applied for the duration.

description:
Decima fires a salvo of fluxlance beams simultaneously. A conduit struck by a beam gains Charge, but blocks the beam's path, allowing targets to take cover if needed.

Makes enemies vulnerable to dancing sparks.

name: Focused Fluxlance
description:
Decima targets a conduit with a focused fluxlance attack. The beam charges the targeted conduit unless the indicated number of players stand in the beam to absorb it. 

Does not trigger extra damage from Harmonic Sensitivity.

name: Fulminate

facts.description: Decima will periodically consumes stacks of this effect to target a number of conduits with Chorus of Thunder.
Decima will periodically consume stacks of this effect to target a number of nearby enemies with Chorus of Thunder.

description: Conduits that already have 3 charges when hit by fluxlance or thunder attack damage all enemies in the encounter, apply exposed, and grant Decima 5 stacks of Peal of Harmony and Peal of Discord.

name: Seismic Reposition
description:
Decima leaps to a new location then crashes down violently. The immediate vicinity erupts with jagged rocks and pyrite. Enemies struck by the attack are pushed away. Dodge rolling will end the slide prematurely. Deals increased damage to close targets.

Enemies that impact a conduit will take extra damage and ricochet in another direction.

name: Sparking Reverberation

facts.description: Your outgoing damage is reduced by 25% per stack.

description:
Transcendent Boulder charges the ground around itself with electricity that deals continual damage to all enemies in the area. While channeling this skill, its defiance bar is unlocked.

If the skill finishes successfully, a stack of frailty is applied to the entire squad.

name: Fracture Armor
description: Decima's armor fractures, leaving her vulnerable to her own Flux Nova attack. When Flux Nova detonates, Decima will become stunned and exposed.

name: Mainshock

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

description: Decima slams an orb of arcane flux into the ground, causing a cascade of ruptures to form around her. The ground heaves with enough force to shatter bones and cripple her enemies.

name: The World Ends in Decay
description: Greer's power has been allowed to build for too long. Time is up, the battle is lost, and all perishes to his decay. Better luck next time.

name: Flux Nova
description:
Decima gathers a colossal amount of arcane flux into an unstable orb. After several seconds, she detonates this orb to obliterate her enemies.

If Decima reaches full charge while channeling this skill, it ends early, and the damage becomes unsurvivable.

name: Rake the Rot
description: Greer sweeps his claw in a 60-degree cone, damaging, crippling, poisoning, and knocking back targets. This attack sets up Stomp the Mould, the final attack in the chain.

name: Cage of Decay
description: Gree creates a fan of 5 cascades, starting at the edges of a 180-degree arc and moving towards the center. Rippling thorn barriers travel along these lines, damaging and knocking back anything struck by them. When the barriers reach the end of their track, they create a circular rot cage of barriers surrounding a zone of noxious blight.

name: Foreshock
description: Decima performs a series of stomp attacks to pulverize her puny opponents.

name: Cage of Decay
description: Rot cages create several outward-rippling cascades of rot walls around a zone of noxious blight. The last set of rot walls stay in place for the duration of the noxious blight, damaging, bleeding, and knocking back foes and blocking projectiles that hit them.

He then fires cascades of rot walls that ripple outward, inflicting damage, knockback, and bleeding on anyone hit by them. The final rot wall stays in place, blocking player projectiles that hit them.

name: Rake the Rot
description: Greer sweeps his claw in a 60-degree cone, damaging, crippling, poisoning, and knocking back targets. This attack sets up Stomp the Mould, the final attack in the chain.

name: Enfeebling Miasma
description: Greer exhales lingering clouds of poisonous gas that travel outward to form 3 roughly conical areas. The gas clouds stay in place for several seconds, poisoning foes inside them.

description: Decima performs a series of stomp attacks to pulverize her puny opponents.

name: Enfeebling Miasma
description: Greer exhales lingering clouds of poisonous gas that travel outward to form 3 conical areas. The gas clouds stay in place for several seconds, poisoning foes inside them. If a victim of the gas gains 20 stacks of poison, they will be converted into 1 stack of Plague Rot.

name: Cage of Decay
description: Greer creates a fan of 5 cascades, starting at the edges of a 180-degree arc and moving toward the center. Rippling thorn barriers travel along these lines, damaging and knocking back anything struck by them. When the barriers reach the end of their track, they create a circular rot cage of barriers surrounding a zone of noxious blight.

name: Harmonic Sensitivity
description: Taking damage from a fluxlance attack while under the effects of Harmonic Sensitivity causes extra damage.

Decima leaps to a new location then crashes down violently. The immediate vicinity erupts with jagged rocks and pyrite. Enemies struck by the attack are pushed away. Dodge rolling will end the slide prematurely. Deals increased damage to close targets.

Enemies that impact a conduit will take extra damage and ricochet in another direction.

name: Bumble
description: Charge at your enemy, knocking them down.

description: Noxious blights form persistent pools of corruption on the ground. Foes in a noxious blight take continuous damage, and their boons will be corrupted while they remain in the noxious blight.

name: Honey Toss

facts.description: Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.
Skills and actions are slower.

description: Beast. Launch a beehive at your enemy, covering the ground with sticky honey on impact.

name: Seismic Crash
description:
Decima slams down, causing the immediate vicinity to erupt with jagged rocks and pyrite. The tremendous force sends enemies sliding away. Dodge rolling will end the slide prematurely. Deals increased damge to close targets.

Enemies that impact a conduit will take extra damage and ricochet in another direction.

name: Seismic Reposition
description:
Decima leaps to a new location then crashes down violently. The immediate vicinity erupts with jagged rocks and pyrite. Enemies struck by the attack are pushed away. Dodge rolling will end the slide prematurely. Deals increased damage to close targets.

Enemies that impact a conduit will take extra damage and ricochet in another direction.

name: Fulgent Aura
description: Charged conduits emit a dangerous aura of Arcane Flux that damages nearby enemies. The aura increases in size as the conduit gains more Charge.

name: Stinging Sorrow

facts.description: Deals damage every second; decreases healing effectiveness by 33%; damage stacks intensity.

description: Unleash a flurry of rage-filled jabs.

name: Foreshock
description: Decima performs a series of stomp attacks to pulverize her puny opponents.

name: Earthrend
description: When Decima leaps, anything she lands on gets squashed like a bug.

name: Mainshock

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

description: Decima slams an orb of arcane flux into the ground, causing a cascade of ruptures to form around her. The ground heaves with enough force to shatter bones and cripple her enemies.

name: Stomp the Growth
description: Greer stomps 3 times in quick succession. The first two stomps hit all targets in a circle around the impact point, dealing damage, inflicting poison, and applying vulnerability. The third stomp creates a wave of corruption.

name: Fulgent Fence
description: Decima periodically links two conduits together with a tether of arcane flux. Enemies entering the beam are damaged and pushed out. Enemies that are shoved into the beam by Decima's attacks are ejected at high speed.

name: Brutal Mauling
description: A heavy melee attack.

name: Earthfall
description:
Transcendent Boulder leaps into the air and slams its fists down, damaging and knocking down nearby enemies. Additionally, six boon-stripping arcs of electricity are released that spread out before returning to their source.

The arcs can only strike enemies touching the ground.

name: Sparking Aura
description: Conduits with charge periodically release dancing sparks that move toward Decima. Sparks lose some health and stop moving temporarily when enough players are standing in their aura. If a dancing spark reaches Decima, it is absorbed and grants her some charge.

name: Rot Eruption
description: Rot walls burst from the ground, knocking players back and creating a noxious blight at the eruption point. Players hit by a rot eruption take damage and suffer from poison and bleeding. While challenge mode is active, they also gain a stack of Plague Rot.

name: Rake the Rot
description: The Greerling sweeps its claw in a 60-degree cone, damaging, crippling, poisoning, and knocking back targets. This attack sets up Stomp the Mould, the final attack in the chain.

name: Flux Nova
description:
Upon reaching maximum charge, Decima gathers all her arcane flux into an unstable orb. After a few seconds, she detonates it to obliterate her enemies.

This version of Flux Nova can trigger any time Decima reaches maximum charge.

name: Fluxlance Salvo

facts.description:
Recent damage from Decima's fluxlance attacks has made you more vulnerable to dancing sparks.

When taking damage from a dancing spark, you will also take significant extra damage from Galvanic Sensitivity.

Galvanic Sensitivity removes Harmonic Sensitivity and prevents it from being applied for the duration.

description:
Decima fires a salvo of fluxlance beams simultaneously. A conduit struck by a beam gains Charge, but blocks the beam's path, allowing targets to take cover if needed.

Makes enemies vulnerable to dancing sparks.

name: Cage of Decay
description: Greer creates a fan of 5 cascades, starting at the edges of a 180-degree arc and moving toward the center. Rippling thorn barriers travel along these arcs, damaging and knocking back anything struck by them. When the barriers reach the end of their track, they create a circular rot cage surrounding a zone of noxious blight. Players caught in the rot cage gain a stack of Plague Rot.

name: Charged Ground

facts.description: Unable to activate skills.
Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

description: A persistent electrical field that increases in damage over time appears under any player hit by Sparkwave. Upon reaching maximum damage, it also dazes and applies vulnerability.

name: Enfeebling Miasma
description: Reeg exhales lingering clouds of poisonous gas that travel outward to form 3 conical areas. The gas clouds stay in place for several seconds, poisoning foes inside them. Victims affected by the gas who have 20 stacks of poison have those stacks turned into 1 stack of Plague Rot.

name: Toxic Geyser
description: Applies poison and Sulfuric Acid, and grants protection and might to Ura.
